A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not sure I will ever be able to trust \"critics\" again. This movie was terrible. Not only did it dismantle and trash the entire star wars franchise\, but it did so in an entirely incoherent and unsophisticated plot. If you haven't seen this movie yet\, please don't. The \"last hope\" for any true star wars fan is for Disney to get the message and correct course for the future.
